summary: This is an email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, Public Affairs/Press Office, forwarding a TODAY show piece about Jeffrey Epstein and noting that a full story will run on Dateline. It appears to be internal DOJ communication regarding media coverage.

events.title: TODAY show piece on Epstein
events.description: A piece about Jeffrey Epstein aired on the TODAY show, with a full story scheduled to run on Dateline.

keyFacts: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York was monitoring media coverage of the Epstein case in September 2019.
A TODAY show piece about Epstein aired on September 20, 2019.
A full story on Epstein was scheduled to air on Dateline on the same date.
This document shows internal DOJ communication regarding press coverage of the case.
